title: [Fragile X-associated tremor/ataxia syndrome].
abstract: Fragile X-associated tremor/ataxia syndrome(FXTAS) is a neurodegenerative disease caused by FMR1 gene permutation(PM). The main clinical manifestations are intention tremor and/or ataxia, and the pathogenesis was related to RNA toxicity. In this paper, the research progress of clinical manifestatios, pathological characteristics, epidemiology and molecular mechanisms will be reviewed.
